person.persName: John Calvin Mason (Bath County, Kentucky, attorney, congressman, and soldier.)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, attorney, congressman, and soldier. Montgomery County, Kentucky, native. Son of James Mason and Elizabeth Fishback Mason. Married to Ann Eliza Owings Mason in Bath County, Kentucky, in 1847. Father of Charcilla Mason, Thomas Mason, Fannie Mason, Colegate Mason, Elizabeth Mason, John Calvin Mason, Jr., James Mason, Anne Mason, Mary Mason, Caroline Mason, George Mason, Robert Mason, and Owings Mason. Served in the Mexican-American War. Served as a congressman from 1849 to 1853, and from 1857 to 1859. Attorney in Bath County in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in Bath County, Kentucky, in 1860. Served with the Texas State Troops (C.S.A.) from 1863 to 1865.
